TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ISinglePhaseNotification implements class System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification

summary.span: 描述支持单阶段提交优化以参与事务的资源对象。

span.span: Describes a resource object that supports single phase commit optimization to participate in a transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你应注意，即使你的资源管理器实现此接口以支持单阶段提交优化时，也不能保证它将接收的单阶段提交。You should note that even when your resource manager implements this interface to support single phase commit optimization, it is not guaranteed that it receives a single phase commit. 事务管理器仍可以改为发送两阶段提交通知。The transaction manager can still send two phase commit notifications instead. 若要在资源管理器作为一名参与者在事务中登记，调用方法或方法类。To enlist your resource manager as a participant in a transaction, call the method or the method of the class. 具体而言，`EnlistmentOptions`参数应等于以确保执行单阶段提交。Specifically, the `EnlistmentOptions` parameter should equal to to ensure that a single phase commit is performed. 如果错误地将其设置为，都会执行提交任何单阶段。If it is mistakenly set to , no single phase commit occurs. 由于接口派生自接口，用于两阶段提交通知，资源管理器还必须实现的后者的所有方法。Since the interface derives from the interface, the resource manager must also implement all the methods of the latter for two phase commit notifications. 它是两阶段提交的事务管理器的选择，或与此资源管理器使用单阶段提交优化。It is the transaction manager's choice as to whether two phase commit or the single phase commit optimization is used with this resource manager. 但是，实现此接口为资源管理器提供了可用时要利用的优化。However, implementing this interface gives the resource manager the opportunity to take advantage of the optimization when it is available. 如果使用优化和事务管理器调用登记的资源的方法，资源管理器应响应此调用通过使用各种不同方法类，如果告诉事务管理器事务是提交或回滚。If the optimization is used and the transaction manager calls the method of the enlisted resource, the resource manager should respond to this call by using various methods of the class to inform the transaction manager if the transaction is to be committed or rolled back.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SinglePhaseCommit(class System.Transactions.SinglePhaseEnlistment singlePhaseEnlistment) cil managed
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SinglePhaseCommit(class System.Transactions.SinglePhaseEnlistment enlistment) cil managed

summary.span: 表示资源管理器的用于单阶段提交优化的回调实现。

span.span: Represents the resource manager's implementation of the callback for the single phase commit optimization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 它是两阶段提交的事务管理器的选择，或与此资源管理器使用单阶段提交优化。It is the transaction manager's choice as to whether two phase commit or the single phase commit optimization is used with this resource manager. 有关单阶段和两阶段提交的详细信息，请参阅[中 Single-Phase 提交事务和多个阶段](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/74b3cfe1-d33a-45b8-91f4-dfd6f6598c4d)。For more information on single phase and two phase commit, see [Committing A Transaction In Single-Phase and Multi-Phase](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/74b3cfe1-d33a-45b8-91f4-dfd6f6598c4d). 因此，在资源管理器，此登记任一调用方法时，或两个阶段中定义的提交方法称为接口。Therefore, on this enlistment of the resource manager, either the method is called, or the two phase commit methods defined in ther interface are called. 此方法的实现应调用方法或方法`singlePhaseEnlistment`参数以指示是否应提交或回滚事务。Your implementation of this method should call either the method or the method of the `singlePhaseEnlistment` parameter to indicate whether the transaction should be committed or rolled back. 当只有一个可变参与者支持单阶段提交，或当有零个或多个可变登记和一个持久登记，事务管理器将调用此方法。The transaction manager calls this method when there is only one volatile enlistment that supports single phase commit, or when there are zero or more volatile enlistments and one durable enlistment. 在后一种情况下，易失性登记接收两-阶段提交和唯一的持久登记通知会接收的单阶段提交通知。In the latter case, the volatile enlistments receive notifications for two-phase-commit, and the sole durable enlistment receives a single-phase commit notification.
